title: Water Finance Conference call for speakers extended to March 25 - Water Finance & Management
content: Water Finance Conference call for speakers extended to March 25  Water Finance & Management
description: Organizers of the 2022 Water Finance Conference have extended the call for speakers for its eight annual event to be held Aug. 17-18 in Washington, D.C. Please email your 200-word abstract by March 25, 2022. The Water Finance Conference convenes executive-level utility professionals, including directors, superintendents, CEOs, CFOs and finance managers with consultants, financialRead More
